Documentation.content: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells.
Documentation.firstline: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells

Definition.name: ExtractTri

Documentation.return: Matrix of cells in Layout_Cell format representing a triangular matrix (upper or lower)

param.name: tri
param.desc: Triangle type: Upper or Lower (see Types.Triangle)

param.name: dt
param.desc: Diagonal type: Unit or non unit (see Types.Diagonal)

Documentation.content: Extract the upper or lower triangle from the composite output from getrf (LU Factorization).
Documentation.firstline: Extract the upper or lower triangle from the composite output from getrf (LU Factorization)
